tool_description: Reference Data API provides data to be added to UI dropdowns. Currently this API is providing list of countries.
name: Reference Data
title: Reference Data

api_list.name: GetCountries
api_list.description: This will provide list of 195 countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://reference-data1.p.rapidapi.com/api/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reference-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://reference-data1.p.rapidapi.com/api/countries"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reference-data1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
